errors:
This table contains all of the error messages generated by core avmplus. This will likely be replaced by a resource table for easy localization. %o = ScriptObject* %t = Traits* %m = MethodInfo* %n = Multiname (name portion only) %N = Multiname (namespace portion only) %a = Atom %d = int %f = double %S = Stringp %s = char* 系统内存不足。 Flash Player needs more memory to compile your code than your system has available. Close some of the applications or processes running on your system. 未实现 %1 方法。 精度参数必须介于 %2 到 %3 之间；%1 无效。 You specified a value that is not within the expected range of the precision argument. Number.toPrecision has a range of 1 to 21. Number.toFixed and Number.toExponential have a range of 0 to 20. 基数参数必须介于 2 到 36 之间；当前值为 %1。 You passed a value less than 2 or greater than 36 for the radix argument of a method or property. Pass a value between 2 and 36 as a radix argument. 对不兼容的对象调用了方法 %1。 You tried to call a method that is not available to the specified object. This error occurs when you have copied a prototype function from one object to another, and then invoked it, but the target object is not the same type as the original object. Ensure that the target object and original object are the same type. See the ECMAScript Language Specification, 3rd Edition, Chapter 15 for more details. 数组索引不是正整数 (%1)。 You tried to access a member of an array using an index value that is not a positive integer. Pass only positive integers as index values for arrays. %1 不是函数。 This error occurs when you attempt to call a function that does not exist. Make sure you are calling the correct function, and that the API has not changed from ActionScript 2.0. Also, make sure you are using the correct object. For example, you will see this error when you use the following code (because the last line mistakenly calls the variable big instead of blg): 
var blg:String = "foo";
var big:Sprite = new Sprite();
var error:int = big.length();
尝试实例化的函数不是构造函数。 %1 有歧义；找到多个匹配的绑定。 无法访问空对象引用的属性或方法。 An object that evaluates to null can have no properties. This error can occur in some unexpected (though valid) situations. For example, consider the following code, which creates a Sprite object. Because this Sprite object is never added to the display list (through the addChild() method of a DisplayObjectContainer object), its stage property is set to null. Thus, the example generates this error because Sprite object's stage property cannot have any properties: 
import flash.display.Sprite;
var sprite1:Sprite = new Sprite();
var q:String = sprite1.stage.quality;
术语尚未定义，并且无任何属性。 This error can occur if you try to access a property of an object that does not exist. For example: 
var obj:Object = new Object();
obj.a = "foo";
trace(obj.b.prop);

You can also see this error because of a misspelling, for example in the following, where mc represents a MovieClip object in the display list, and the stage property is misspelled with a capital S (it should be stage):

trace(mc.Stage.quality);
方法 %1 包含非法 opcode %2 (偏移量为 %3)。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 最后一条指令超出代码大小。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 当 scopeDepth 为 0 时，无法调用 OP_findproperty。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 无法找到类 %1。 方法 %1 无法设置默认 XML 命名空间 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 类型 %1 不支持后代运算符 (..)。 发生范围堆栈上溢。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 发生范围堆栈下溢。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Getscopeobject %1 超出范围。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 代码不能超出方法结尾。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 至少一个分支目标不是方法中的有效指令。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* void 类型只能用作函数返回类型。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 发生堆栈上溢。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 发生堆栈下溢。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 访问了无效的注册 %1。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Slot %1 超出 %3 中 slotCount=%2 的限制。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Method_info %1 超出 method_count=%2 的限制。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Disp_id %1 超出 %3 中 max_disp_id=%2 的限制。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Disp_id %1 在 %2 上未定义。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 堆栈深度不对称。%1 != %2。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 范围深度不对称。%1 != %2。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Cpool 索引 %1 超出范围 %2。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* Cpool 项 %1 类型错误。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 强制转换类型失败:无法将 %1 转换为 %2。 发现方法 %1 中存在非法的 super 表达式。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 无法在 %2 上为方法 %1 赋值。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* %1 已定义。 You cannot declare a variable or function with the same identifier name more than once within the same scope. In ActionScript 3.0, different code blocks (such as those used in two for loops in the same function definition) are considered to be in the same scope. See the note at the bottom of this table.* 在方法被引用之前无法对其进行验证。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* instanceof 的右侧必须是类或函数。 The expression on the right side of the instanceof operator must be a class or function. 运算符的右侧必须是类。 The expression on the right side of the is operator must be a class. 不是 ABC 文件。major_version=%1 minor_version=%2。 You are attempting to use an invalid file with the player: the tool that generates the SWF may be out of date or the SWF itself may be corrupt. code_length=%1 无效。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* MethodInfo-%1 不支持 flags=%2。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 不支持 trait kind=%1。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* MethodInfo-%1 被引用时未定义。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 未找到入口点。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 原型对象必须是 vanilla 对象。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 无法将 %1 转换为原始类型。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 对 %1 的早期绑定访问是非法的。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 传递给 %1 函数的 URI 无效。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 在 %2 中非法覆盖 %1。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 异常处理函数中存在非法的范围或目标偏移量。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 无法为 %2 创建属性 %1。 You are trying to assign a value to a nonexistent property on an instance of a non-dynamic class. This is only possible for instances of dynamic classes %1 只能包含方法。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 非法的操作数类型: %1 必须是 %2。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* ClassInfo-%1 被引用时未定义。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* ClassInfo %1 超出 class_count=%2 的限制。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 无法在不损失精度的情况下将值 %1 转换为 %2。 This error appears if you attempt to assign a decimal number to a property that has data type int.

This error also appears for out-of-range assignments, such as the following:

var m0:int = 2147483648; // int.MAX_VALUE == 2147483647

You can also see this error when using the bitwise left shift operator (<<). For example, consider the following code:

var m0:uint = 0xFF;
var m1:uint = m0<<24;

The result of left shift operator (<<) is interpreted as a 32-bit two's complement number with sign. In the example, the result is a negative value, which causes the error when assigned to the uint typed property. A workaround is the following:

var m0:uint = 0xFF;
var m1:uint = uint(m0<<24);
%1 的参数数量不匹配。应该有 %2 个，当前为 %3 个。 无法将方法 %1 作为构造函数调用。 Extracted methods are permanently bound to the object they are extracted from. Therefore, they can not later be called as a constructor. For example, the following creates function f() in Class A: 
class A {
       function f() {}
    }
In the following code, extracting the function causes no error. However, creating a new instance of the function causes an error. 
var a = new A()
    var m = a.f // extract f, don't call it
    m() // same as a.f()
    new m() // causes this error
变量 %1 未定义。 You are using an undefined lexical reference. For example, in the following statements, the statement trace(x) generates an error because x is undefined. However, the statement trace(y) doesn't generate an error because y is defined: 
trace("hello world")
    trace(x) // x is undefined
    var y
    trace(y) // No error, y is defined.
不支持 function('function body') 形式。 Unlike JavaScript, Flash does not compile code on-the-fly using eval() and function(). Thus, calling these as a constructor in ActionScript 3.0 generates this error. 内置方法 %1 含有非法的方法正文。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* %1 和 %2 无法协调一致。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 在 %2 上找不到属性 %1，且没有默认值。 You are referencing an undefined property on a non-dynamic class instance. For example, the following generates this error when it references property x, which is not defined and cannot be created dynamically: 
class A {} // sealed class, not dynamic
    trace(new A().x) // no property x defined on A, and A is not dynamic
在 %2 上找不到方法 %1 You are using a super statement to call a function, but the function doesn't exist in the super class. For example, the following code generates the error: 
class A() {}
class B extends A {
  function f() { trace(super.f()); } // error 1070, there is no f on A
}
函数 %1 已被绑定到 %2。 Disp_id 0 是非法的。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 由于 disp_id %2 的重复，非覆盖方法 %1 已被替换。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* %2 上存在对只读属性 %1 的非法写入。 Math 不是函数。 You are trying to call math() as a function, but the Math class is a class with static methods. Math 不是构造函数。 You can not instantiate the Math class. %2 上存在对只写属性 %1 的非法读取。 非法的 opcode/multiname 组合: %1<%2>。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 载入代码中不允许使用内置方法。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 非法的命名空间值。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 在 %2 上找不到属性 %1，且没有默认值。 未设置默认的命名空间。 See the note at the bottom of this table.* 元素“%2”的前缀“%1”未绑定。 An attribute name or element name has a prefix but no matching namespace was found. This statement generates an error because there is no foo namespace to match foo:x:
<foo:x xmlns:clowns='http://circuscenter.org'>
元素或属性 (“%1”) 与 QName 定义不匹配: QName::=(NCName':')?NCName。 You have foo: or :foo as an element or attribute name, but there is nothing on the other side of the colon. 元素类型“%1”必须以匹配的结束标记“”结束。 %1 方法只能用于包含单一项目的列表。 The XMLList class propagates the XML-specific functions to one child if it has only one item in its list. If more than one item is in the list, the routines fail with this error. This happens for the following XMLList functions that mimic XML functions:

addNamespace, appendChild, childIndex, inScopeNamespaces, insertChildAfter, insertChildBefore, name, namespace, localName, namespaceDeclarations, nodeKind, prependChild, removeNamespace, replace, setChildren, setLocalName, setName, and setNamespace. 不允许对索引 XML 进行赋值。 文档中根元素后面的标记格式必须正确。 These are possible causes of this error:

  • Parsing an XMLList style object as XML
  • Misbalanced strings
不支持对包含多个项目的列表进行赋值。 XML 分析器失败: 元素格式不正确。 An element name is malformed. This example of an element name is malformed because a trailing right angle bracket > is missing: 
<a/><b></b
XML 分析器失败: CDATA 部分未结束。 XML 分析器失败: XML 声明未结束。 XML 分析器失败: DOCTYPE 声明未结束。 XML 分析器失败: 注释未结束。 XML 分析器失败: 属性未结束。 XML 分析器失败: 元素未结束。 XML 分析器失败: 正在处理的指令未结束。 no namespace 带有非法前缀 %1。 The namespace constructor throws this error if you try to pass in an empty URI with a non-empty prefix as in this example: 
ns = new Namespace ("prefix", "");
    

  
  
    在由一个 RegExp 构建另一个的过程中无法提供标志。
    
    Creating a new regular expression from an existing one also copies its flags. To create a regular expression with
    different flags, use the new operator and set the flags as desired. For example, this statement
    creates a regular expression and specifies flag settings:
    
var re:RegExp = new RegExp("ali", /s)

    Alternatively, this statement creates a regular expression that has the same flags as re:
    
var re2:RegExp = new RegExp(re, ...)
    

   
    无法验证具有未知范围的方法 %1。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

   
    类型 %1 的默认值非法。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

   
    类 %1 不能扩展最终基类。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

   已指定属性“%1”(针对元素“%2”)。
  
  
  
    ABC 数据已损坏，尝试的读取操作超出范围。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  
    OP_newclass opcode 使用的基类不正确。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  
    尝试直接调用非绑定函数 %1 (从方法 %2 中调用)。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  
    %1 无法扩展 %2。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  
    %1 无法实现 %2。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

   类强制转换的参数数量不匹配。应为 1 个，当前为 %1 个。
   
    方法中使用的 OP_newactivation 没有 NEED_ACTIVATION 标志。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  
    使用的 OP_getglobalslot 或 OP_setglobalslot 不具有全局范围。
    
        See the note at the bottom of this table.*
    

  %1 不是构造函数。
  Function.prototype.apply 的第二个参数必须是数组。
  XML 名称无效: %1。
  节点间存在非法循环。
  类型 %1 的操作数不支持删除运算符。
  无法为 %2 删除属性 %1。
  方法 %1 具有重复的方法正文。
   接口方法 %1 含有非法的方法正文。
  类型 %1 不支持过滤运算符。
  OP_hasnext2 要求对象和索引位于不同的寄存器。
  索引 %1 超出范围 %2。
  无法更改固定矢量的长度。
  尝试对非参数化类型执行类型应用程序。
  %1 的类型参数的个数不正确。应为 %2，当前为 %3。
  循环结构无法转换为 JSON 字符串。
  
  JSON stringifier 的 Replacer 参数必须是数组或两参数函数。
  无效的 JSON 解析输入。
 
  
  打开文件 %1 时出错。
  
    写入文件 %1 时出错。
    
        The file you are writing to cannot be opened. Possibly the filename contains an error, the file is read-only, or
        you do not have access privileges.
        
        
  
    脚本的执行时间已经超过了 15 秒的默认超时设置。
    
        A script executed after the timeout period. (The default timeout period is 15 seconds.) After this error occurs, the
        script can continue to execute for 15 seconds more, after which the script terminates and throws run-time error number 1503 (A script failed to exit after 30 seconds and was terminated.)
    
 
  
    脚本未能在 30 秒后退出而被终止。
    
      The script was still executing after 30 seconds. Flash Player first throws run-time error number 1502 (A script has executed for longer than the default timeout period of 15 seconds.) if the script executed more than 15
      seconds, which is the default timeout period. This error occurs 15 seconds after Error 1502 occurs.
    
     
    文件结尾。
    
      Flash Player unexpectedly encountered the end of the file. Possibly the file was not saved correctly or Flash Player expected more data
      in the file.
    
  
  字符串索引 %1 超出范围；必须在 %2 到 %3 的范围内。
  
    指定的范围无效。
    
    The method's start parameter is greater than its end parameter.
    
  参数 %1 不能为空。
  
    为参数 %1 指定的值无效。
    
    You are possibly trying to pass the wrong data type. For example, the code
    
public function doSomething(const:int):void {
    }
    this ["doSomething"] ("str")

    generates an error at runtime because doSomething is cast as an int data type. 

  如果回调参数是某个类的方法，则可选参数“this”必须为空。
  Worker 已启动。
  不支持启动已失败的 Worker。
  Worker 已终止。"
  unlock() 前面没有匹配的 lock()。
  无效的条件超时值: %1。
  如果未拥有关联的 mutex，条件无法 notify。
  如果未拥有关联的 mutex，条件无法 notifyAll。
  如果未拥有关联的 mutex，条件无法执行 wait。
  无法初始化条件。
  无法初始化 Mutex。
  仅该 worker 的父级可以呼叫 start。

  某个参数无效。
  提供的索引超出范围。
  参数 %1 不能为空。
  参数 %1 必须是某个可接受的值。
  无法实例化 %1 类。
  遇到文件尾。
  解压缩数据时出错。
  参数 %1 必须为非空字符串。
  Proxy 类不实现 getProperty。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 setProperty。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 callProperty。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 hasProperty。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 deleteProperty。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 getDescendants。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 nextNameIndex。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 nextName。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  Proxy 类不实现 nextValue。它必须由一个子类覆盖。
  值 %1 不是有效的数组长度。
  无法读取流中的对象。类 %1 虽未实现 flash.utils.IExternalizable，但由其别名可得知它为 externalizable 类。
